This Skill deals +10% damage on Critical Hit
[WhenUse] At 10+ [Breath], Base Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Breath]

levelList.name: Front Line Fire

This Skill deals +10% damage on Critical Hit
[WhenUse] At 10+ [Breath], Base Power +1

levelList.name: Punch Through
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Breath]
[WhenUse] At 10+ [Breath], Base Power +1
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Breath] Count on self (max 2)
[WinDuel] This Attack Skill deals +50% damage on Critical Hit

coindescs.desc: This Coin deals damage only against the main target.

This Coin deals damage only against the sub-targets
- If the first Coin failed to kill the ally or if the target wasn't Staggered, 1 random sub-target takes damage

levelList.name: Reload, Fire
levelList.desc:
This Skill deals +50% damage on Critical Hit
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Breath] Count on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [Breath]

levelList.name: See Through Defenses
levelList.desc:
[DefeatDuel] Halve [Breath] on self
- Any [Breath] gained during this turn are halved as well
- Gain 4 [Paralysis] next turn

levelList.name: Designated Target Fire
levelList.desc:
Attacks the target with [FellBulletMark]
Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Breath] on self (max 2)
Base Power +1 for every 3 [Breath] Count on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] If the main target does not have [FellBulletMark], gain 1 [Paralysis] and 3 [Vulnerable]
[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, gain 10 [Breath] and lower every enemy's SP by 15

coindescs.desc: This Coin deals damage only against the main target.
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has [FellBulletMark], gain 10 [Breath] next turn

This Coin deals damage only against the sub-targets
- If the first Coin failed to kill the target, 2 random sub-targets take damage

levelList.name: Target Readjustment Fire
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
[CantChangeTarget]
Prioritizes the target with [FellBulletMark]
If this unit failed to attack the Stigmatized target, cancel this Skill.
Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Breath] on self (max 2)
Base Power +1 for every 3 [Breath] Count on self (max 3)
[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, gain 10 [Breath] and lower every enemy's SP by 15

coindescs.desc: This Coin deals damage only against the main target

- If the first Coin failed to kill the target, 1 random sub-target takes damage

levelList.name: Nutrient Craving
levelList.desc:
Activates at 100+ [BloodDinner]
[EndBattle] Consume up to 100 [BloodDinner] to activate the following effects:
- Heal the Core and the Body Parts' HP by [BloodDinner] consumed
- Gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn for every 20 [BloodDinner] consumed

levelList.name: Brambles that Yearn
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume up to 100 [BloodDinner] to activate the following effects:
- Heal the Core and the Body Parts' HP by [BloodDinner] consumed
- This Skill gains Final Power +1 for every 20 [BloodDinner] consumed
[DefeatDuel] Final Power -5
[EndSkill] If this Skill consumed less than 30 [BloodDinner], gain 2 [Vulnerable] next turn
